text: Chris Butler (born February 16, 1988 in Hilton Head Island, South Carolina) is an American cyclist, who last rode for UCI Professional Continental team . ==Career achievements== ===Major results=== ;2012 : 5th Overall Tour of Japan : 7th Overall Tour of Hainan ;2015 : 3rd Overall Vuelta a la Independencia Nacional ;2016 : 1st Overall Tour of Arad ::1st Stage 3 : 1st Mount Evans Hill Climb : 1st Stage 4 Tour de Hongrie ;2017 : 8th Overall Tour of Utah ===Grand Tour General Classification results timeline=== {| cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="font-size: 95%; border: #aaa solid 1px; border-collapse: collapse;" |- style="background:#eee;" !Grand Tour !2011 !2012 !2013 !2014 |- | style="text-align:left; background:#efefef;"|alt=Pink jersey Giro | style="text-align:center;"|WD | style="text-align:center;"|— | style="text-align:center;"|— | style="text-align:center;"|— |- | style="text- align:left; background:#efefef;"|alt=Yellow jersey Tour | style="text- align:center;"|— | style="text-align:center;"|— | style="text-align:center;"|— | style="text-align:center;"|— |- | style="text-align:left; background:#efefef;"|alt=red jersey Vuelta | style="text-align:center;"|— | style="text-align:center;"|— | style="text-align:center;"|— | style="text- align:center;"|— |} WD = Withdrew; In Progress = IP ==References== ==External links== * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:American male cyclists Category:People from Hilton Head, South Carolina
title: Chris Butler (cyclist)
